an6.55:4.1: * Evaṃ me sutaṃ—​
an6.55:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an6.55:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā soṇo rājagahe viharati sītavanasmiṃ.
an6.55:4.4: Atha kho āyasmato soṇassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
an6.55:4.5: “ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro.
an6.55:4.6: Atha ca pana me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati, saṃvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā, sakkā bhogā ca bhuñjituṃ puññāni ca kātuṃ.
an6.55:4.7: Yannūnāhaṃ sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjeyyaṃ puññāni ca kareyyan”ti.
an6.55:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—
an6.55:5.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
an6.55:5.4: gijjhakūṭe pabbate antarahito sītavane āyasmato soṇassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
an6.55:5.6: Āyasmāpi kho soṇo bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an6.55:5.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an6.55:6.1: “Nanu te, soṇa, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
an6.55:6.2: ‘ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro.
an6.55:6.3: Atha ca pana me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati, saṃvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā, sakkā bhogā ca bhuñjituṃ puññāni ca kātuṃ.
an6.55:6.4: Yannūnāhaṃ sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjeyyaṃ puññāni ca kareyyan’”ti?
an6.55:7.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, kusalo tvaṃ pubbe agāriyabhūto vīṇāya tantissare”ti?
an6.55:7.3: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?
an6.55:8.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo atisithilā honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?
an6.55:9.1: “Yadā pana te, soṇa, vīṇāya tantiyo na accāyatā honti nātisithilā same guṇe patiṭṭhitā, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?
an6.55:10.1: “Evamevaṃ kho, soṇa, accāraddhavīriyaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati, atisithilavīriyaṃ kosajjāya saṃvattati.
an6.55:10.2: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, soṇa, vīriyasamathaṃ adhiṭṭhaha, indriyānañca samataṃ paṭivijjha, tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti.
an6.55:10.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā soṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.55:10.4: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ iminā ovādena ovaditvā—
an6.55:10.5: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
an6.55:11.1: Atha kho āyasmā soṇo aparena samayena vīriyasamathaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi, indriyānañca samataṃ paṭivijjhi, tattha ca nimittaṃ aggahesi.
an6.55:11.2: Atha kho āyasmā soṇo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
an6.55:11.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anāgāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an6.55:11.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an6.55:11.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an6.55:11.6: Aññataro ca panāyasmā soṇo arahataṃ ahosi.
an6.55:12.1: Atha kho āyasmato soṇassa arahattappattassa etadahosi:
an6.55:12.4: Atha kho āyasmā soṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.55:12.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.55:13.1: “Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto, so cha ṭhānāni adhimutto hoti—
an6.55:13.2: nekkhammādhimutto hoti, pavivekādhimutto hoti, abyāpajjādhimutto hoti, taṇhākkhayādhimutto hoti, upādānakkhayādhimutto hoti, asammohādhimutto hoti.
an6.55:14.1: Siyā kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa āyasmato evamassa:
an6.55:14.3: Na kho panetaṃ, bhante, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.55:14.4: Khīṇāsavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitavā katakaraṇīyo karaṇīyaṃ attano asamanupassanto katassa vā paṭicayaṃ khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā nekkhammādhimutto hoti, khayā dosassa vītadosattā nekkhammādhimutto hoti, khayā mohassa vītamohattā nekkhammādhimutto hoti. (1)
an6.55:15.1: Siyā kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa āyasmato evamassa:
an6.55:15.3: Na kho panetaṃ, bhante, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.55:15.4: Khīṇāsavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitavā katakaraṇīyo karaṇīyaṃ attano asamanupassanto katassa vā paṭicayaṃ khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā pavivekādhimutto hoti, khayā dosassa vītadosattā pavivekādhimutto hoti, khayā mohassa vītamohattā pavivekādhimutto hoti. (2)
an6.55:16.1: Siyā kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa āyasmato evamassa:
an6.55:16.3: Na kho panetaṃ, bhante, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.55:16.4: Khīṇāsavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitavā katakaraṇīyo karaṇīyaṃ attano asamanupassanto katassa vā paṭicayaṃ khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā abyāpajjādhimutto hoti, khayā dosassa vītadosattā abyāpajjādhimutto hoti, khayā mohassa vītamohattā abyāpajjādhimutto hoti. (3)
an6.55:17.1: Khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā taṇhākkhayādhimutto hoti, khayā dosassa vītadosattā taṇhākkhayādhimutto hoti, khayā mohassa vītamohattā taṇhākkhayādhimutto hoti. (4)
an6.55:18.1: Khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā upādānakkhayādhimutto hoti, khayā dosassa vītadosattā upādānakkhayādhimutto hoti, khayā mohassa vītamohattā upādānakkhayādhimutto hoti. (5)
an6.55:19.1: Khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā asammohādhimutto hoti, khayā dosassa vītadosattā asammohādhimutto hoti, khayā mohassa vītamohattā asammohādhimutto hoti. (6)
an6.55:20.1: Evaṃ sammā vimuttacittassa, bhante, bhikkhuno bhusā cepi cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyanti.
an6.55:20.2: Amissīkatamevassa cittaṃ hoti ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ vayañcassānupassati.
an6.55:20.7: manoviññeyyā dhammā manassa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyanti.
an6.55:20.8: Amissīkatamevassa cittaṃ hoti ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ vayañcassānupassati.
an6.55:20.9: Seyyathāpi, bhante, selo pabbato acchiddo asusiro ekagghano.
an6.55:20.10: Atha puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi neva naṃ saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya, atha pacchimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi …
an6.55:20.11: atha uttarāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi …
an6.55:20.12: atha dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi neva naṃ saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya;
an6.55:20.13: evamevaṃ kho, bhante, evaṃ sammāvimuttacittassa bhikkhuno bhusā cepi cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyanti.
an6.55:20.14: Amissīkatamevassa cittaṃ hoti, ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ vayañcassānupassati.
an6.55:20.19: manoviññeyyā dhammā manassa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyanti.
an6.55:20.20: Amissīkatamevassa cittaṃ hoti ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ vayañcassānupassatīti.
